con:part.con:content: <wsdl:definitions name="employeeService" targetNamespace="http://controllers.mgmt.ministry.mni/" xmlns:xsd="http://www.w3.org/2001/XMLSchema" <wsdl:types> <xs:schema attributeFormDefault="unqualified" elementFormDefault="unqualified" targetNamespace="http://controllers.mgmt.ministry.mni/" version="1.0" xmlns:xs="http://www.w3.org/2001/XMLSchema"> <xs:element name="employees" type="tns:employee"/> <xs:complexType name="createNewEmpDto"> <xs:sequence> <xs:element minOccurs="0" name="age" type="xs:int"/> <xs:element minOccurs="0" name="empEmail" type="xs:string"/> <xs:element minOccurs="0" name="empId" type="xs:string"/> <xs:element minOccurs="0" name="empName" type="xs:string"/> </xs:sequence> </xs:complexType> <xs:complexType name="employee"> <xs:sequence> <xs:element minOccurs="0" name="id" type="xs:integer"/> <xs:element minOccurs="0" name="empName" type="xs:string"/> <xs:element minOccurs="0" name="empId" type="xs:string"/> <xs:element minOccurs="0" name="empEmail" type="xs:string"/> <xs:element minOccurs="0" name="age" type="xs:int"/> </xs:sequence> </xs:complexType> <xs:complexType final="#all" name="employeeArray"> <xs:sequence> <xs:element maxOccurs="unbounded" minOccurs="0" name="item" nillable="true" type="tns:employee"/> </xs:sequence> </xs:complexType> <xs:element name="SQLException" type="tns:SQLException"/> <xs:complexType name="SQLException"> <xs:sequence> <xs:element minOccurs="0" name="errorCode" type="xs:int"/> <xs:element minOccurs="0" name="sQLState" type="xs:string"/> <xs:element minOccurs="0" name="message" type="xs:string"/> </xs:sequence> </xs:complexType> </xs:schema> </wsdl:types> <wsdl:message name="deleteEmployeeById"> <wsdl:part name="empId" type="xsd:string"></wsdl:part> </wsdl:message> <wsdl:message name="getEmployeeById"> <wsdl:part name="empId" type="xsd:string"></wsdl:part> </wsdl:message> <wsdl:message name="getEmployeeByIdResponse"> <wsdl:part name="return" type="tns:employee"></wsdl:part> </wsdl:message> <wsdl:message name="getAllEmployeeResponse"> <wsdl:part name="return" type="tns:employeeArray"></wsdl:part> </wsdl:message> <wsdl:message name="deleteEmployeeByIdResponse"> <wsdl:part name="return" type="xsd:int"></wsdl:part> </wsdl:message> <wsdl:message name="SQLException"> <wsdl:part element="tns:SQLException" name="SQLException"></wsdl:part> </wsdl:message> <wsdl:message name="createNewEmployee"> <wsdl:part name="arg0" type="tns:createNewEmpDto"></wsdl:part> </wsdl:message> <wsdl:message name="createNewEmployeeResponse"> <wsdl:part name="return" type="tns:createNewEmpDto"></wsdl:part> </wsdl:message> <wsdl:message <wsdl:operation name="createNewEmployee"> <wsdl:input message="tns:createNewEmployee" name="createNewEmployee"></wsdl:input> <wsdl:output message="tns:createNewEmployeeResponse" name="createNewEmployeeResponse"></wsdl:output> <wsdl:fault message="tns:SQLException" name="SQLException"></wsdl:fault> </wsdl:operation> <wsdl:operation name="deleteEmployeeById"> <wsdl:input name="getAllEmployeeResponse"></wsdl:output> <wsdl:fault message="tns:SQLException" name="SQLException"></wsdl:fault> </wsdl:operation> </wsdl:portType> <wsdl:binding name="employeeServiceSoapBinding" type="tns:EmployeeController"> <soap:binding style="rpc" transport="http://schemas.xmlsoap.org/soap/http"/> <wsdl:operation name="createNewEmployee"> <soap:operation soapAction="" style="rpc"/>
